analysis.description: Gorgona.payout (/unique_chucks/16/0x20b3d3f8a3e4f7b23382d844f2ca1d7026d69479.sol#91-126) allows anyone to destruct the contract
Gorgona.bytesToAddress (/unique_chucks/16/0x20b3d3f8a3e4f7b23382d844f2ca1d7026d69479.sol) is declared view but contains assembly code

Gorgona.fallback (/unique_chucks/16/0x20b3d3f8a3e4f7b23382d844f2ca1d7026d69479.sol#43-91) uses a dangerous strict equality:
	- user.deposits == 1

Gorgona.payout has external calls inside a loop:
	- addr.transfer(amount) (/unique_chucks/16/0x20b3d3f8a3e4f7b23382d844f2ca1d7026d69479.sol#116-117)
